Questions to ask your ISP or cloud network/proxy/DNS/VPN provider: 
1) Do you share/sell access to traffic records, and if yes, to whom?
2) What form do those records take (NetFlow, pcap, etc.)?
3) How is this program consistent with applicable laws?
4) Do you notify customers?
